name: FlipPix Art - School
description:
We're headed back to school! Did you have a favorite class? Math, Science, Music, Art? Take your pick!. FlipPix Art - School consists of 6 scenes containing 66 different pictures in 4 sizes, for a total of 264 puzzles.

NEW! Now contains larger 20x20 puzzles!

An old Japanese logic puzzle takes on a new look with FlipPix Art! Touch tiles to paint them or break them to form colorful components of paintings. The goal is to use logic to determine which tiles should be filled to reveal a hidden picture.

Also known as nonograms or griddlers, FlipPix Art puzzles are designed specifically for your iPad.

A short tutorial on the basics of the game is included.
